dialog.text: Theres 3 layers to this drawing. Bottom 1/4th is grass. Next add a layer of trees about 1/2 of the height of the drawing. then add sky for the rest. With some clouds at the very top.
where are the cloud(lfet middle or right)? how is the background weather?
Weather is like a sunset. Clouds at the very top of the image about 1/8th height.
are all the trees have the same height?
Make the trees 50% shorter in the right half. The sky should also be blue.
Are there anything else in the frame?
No, mainly just grass, some trees and sky.
the sky is sunset and blue right?
yeah. Make all the trees 50% smaller.
The trees are in descreting order
